name: Introduction to the Ishikawa Fishbone Diagram
content: This webinar you will understand how to identify the causes of the system constraints in your organization and how to graphically show them in an Ishikawa Fishbone. Why Should You Attend: The global marketplace is faced with a dilemma as to how they categorize their human capital assets. This has been brought about by the changing nature of employment in general. The results are new paradigms in working with our most valuable corporate asset. This webinar looks at the changes and what the future holds for your organization. Areas Covered in the Webinar: Who is Karou Ishikawa What are quality circles Ishikawa 7 tools of quality The uses of the Fishbone diagram Who Will Benefit: This webinar will be of value to all levels within the organization from the corner office to the HR department staff. It will also be of value to your suppliers utilized in the operations of HR.
